title: How can technology help a developing country? - Quora

response.answer_text: Cell phones are a technology that helps people in developing countries communicate quickly over longer distances. This site 5 Ways Technology is Transforming Developing Nations - EPICS in IEEE says: healthcare, environment, economy, education and electricity are 5 things technology can bring. This site Leading Technologies for Developing Countries says cell phones, computers, and the internet bring education and information about things like health awareness, banking and economy.
